attributes.action: Do not extradite Julian Assange to the US. Grant him his freedom
attributes.background: Julian Assange and wikileaks have facilitated whistleblowers in highlighting injustices within powerful organisations across the globe. Despite his service to humanity as a journalist the US wish to extradite him from the UK to face criminal charges for exposing their own government and military.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

You can read more about the case here:
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/world-affairs/europe/extradition-from-the-uk-what-next-for-julian-assange/
